summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sharda HR HRMS system. All major features tested successfully. The main fix (Employee Export button) is working correctly. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend modules load properly with good user experience.

design_issues.issue: JWT tokens expire quickly during testing, requiring frequent re-login

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with stats cards and quick actions
Employee Directory - View list, Search employees, Filter by department
Employee Directory - EXPORT button downloads CSV (MAIN FIX VERIFIED)
Employee Directory - Add new employee form (HR role)
Leave Management - View leave balance, Apply for leave form
Payroll - View payroll runs, All Employees tab, Payroll Rules tab
Performance - View My KPIs, Fill button on draft KPI, Create new KPI
Performance Templates - View templates, Edit button functionality
Performance Team - HR can see Team Performance tab
Goals - View goals, Create new goal form
Assets - View All Assets, Asset detail modal functionality
Expenses - View expenses, Expense detail modal, Submit new expense form
Travel - View travel requests, New travel request form
Reports - All report tabs load correctly (headcount, attrition, payroll, attendance, leave)
User Management - View users list (HR only access verified)
Backend APIs - 100% success rate (12/12 tests passed)
